pageContent: Background: Focal therapy (FT) for localized prostate cancer (PCa) treatment is raising interest. New technological mpMRI-US guided FT devices have never been compared with the previous generation of ultrasound-only guided devices.

metaData.source:
Point/counterpoint. High intensity focused ultrasound may be superior to radiation therapy for the treatment of early stage prostate cancer
